text: only one thing can make a quick hitch better and that is having some quick change pins for the top hook you have flexibility to go up and down depending on your attachments and lots of times you don't need to but when you want to change this top hook height or just take it off and put on one of those top link adapters having the ability to do so quick man it's hard to beat we're going to put these on right now this quick hitch is the most popular we sell it does not use bushings a direct pin fit to category one attachments you order that from Good Works tractors.com we ship Nationwide but get these quick change pins from bolt on hooks.com foreign thank you [Music]
